name: on(1)3 h3lL1 [extra life 2018 prototype]
description:
You're on an island that behaves weirdly and has odd ecosystems. We made this in about 15 hours, streamed on the internet for extra life 2018. We plan to make this into something real. Donations here will go towards our extra life fundraiser

WASD to move, mouse look, click to interact, esc to exit
